thread.title: Good Service and Comfort for a budget hotel
thread.title_full: Good Service and Comfort for a budget hotel - Review of Hotel ibis budget London Whitechapel - Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Appleman55
title: Good Service and Comfort for a budget hotel
text:
I was quite impressed with this place. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and comfortable and the place was quiet as almost all the rooms aware away from the main street.
The location is convenient for the City (within walking distance) and there are two underground stations nearby.
The breakfasts are the continental type and reasonable for the price.
Room Tip: All rooms are much the same See more room tips Green Features: So far as could be seen they adhered to the stated practices. This was not intrusive on the stay.
